commitResults.messageTitle: Add javadoc for parseDateTime() and parseShowDate() in Parser class
Error handling in showDates() method for no tasks on given date returns different output message
Add javadoc for find() method in Ui class
TaskList class: move showDates() method from TaskList to Ui class Ui class: edit showDates() to show number of tasks due Sebastian class: edit "DATE" switch case
test(TaskList): Add unit tests for TaskList methods
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added JUnit tests for adding and removing tasks in TaskList
- Ensured tasks are correctly stored and removed from the list
- Used @BeforeEach to initialize a fresh TaskList instance before each test

These tests improve coverage and ensure TaskList behaves as expected

commitResults.messageTitle: fix(Parser): Correct trimming logic in parseEvent method test(Parser): Add unit tests for parsing methods
commitResults.messageBody:
- Fixed the for loop in parseEvent to properly trim and store values
- Ensured correct splitting logic for event input format
- Added JUnit tests in ParserTest to verify parseTodo, parseDeadline, and parseEvent behavior
- Improved error handling for invalid event formats

This improves input parsing reliability and increases test coverage

commitResults.messageTitle: Change jar file name in build.gradle
commitResults.messageBody: - Changed to seb.ui.Sebastian, where the main() method is found

commitResults.messageTitle: style(checkstyle): Fix Checkstyle violations in codebase
commitResults.messageBody:
- Updated code to comply with Checkstyle rules
- Fixed indentation, naming conventions, and formatting issues
- Ensured consistent coding style across the project

This improves code readability and maintainability.

* tag 'A-CheckStyle':
  chore(checkstyle): Add Checkstyle configuration files

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(gui): Add initial setup for GUI implementation
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added `Main`, `Launcher`, and `DialogBox` classes for GUI integration
- Updated `build.gradle` to support JavaFX dependencies
- Added necessary images in `main/resources/images`
- Prepared the project structure for future GUI enhancements

This sets up the foundation for the graphical user interface.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(gui): Integrate FXML for MainWindow and DialogBox
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added `MainWindow.fxml` and `DialogBox.fxml` for GUI layout
- Updated `Main`, `Launcher`, and `DialogBox` classes to load FXML files
- Improved UI structure for better separation of logic and presentation

This enhances the GUI by using FXML for better maintainability and scalability

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor(Sebastian): Capture Ui output for GUI integration
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added `captureOutput()` method to redirect and capture `Ui` class prints
- Updated `getResponse()` to use `Ui` methods without modifying them
- Ensured `Sebastian` can return responses for both CLI and GUI
- Preserved CLI functionality while enabling GUI interaction

This allows seamless integration of `Sebastian` with the GUI without altering `Ui` methods

commitResults.messageTitle: style(ui): Update Ui messages for more personality
commitResults.messageBody:
- Enhanced messages for a friendlier tone
- Refined task-related responses to be more engaging
- Improved overall conversational feel of the assistant

These changes make interactions with Sebastian more lively and user-friendly

* tag 'Level-10':
  feat(gui): Add initial setup for GUI implementation

* tag 'Level-10':
  refactor(Sebastian): Capture Ui output for GUI integration
  feat(gui): Integrate FXML for MainWindow and DialogBox

- Preserved CLI functionality while enabling GUI interaction

commitResults.messageTitle: style(ui): Update Ui messages for more personality
commitResults.messageBody:
- Enhanced messages for a friendlier tone
- Refined task-related responses to be more engaging
- Improved overall conversational feel of the assistant

These changes make interactions with Sebastian more lively and user-friendly

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(gui): Add Sebastian's photo to welcome message
commitResults.messageBody:
- Updated `MainWindow` to display Sebastian's welcome message with his image on startup
- Ensured `DialogBox` properly handles the welcome message format
- Loaded `sebphoto.jpeg` from resources to maintain consistency with response messages

This improves the user experience by making the GUI more engaging

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: add assertions to document critical assumptions
commitResults.messageBody:
Assertions have been added to key areas of the codebase to document
assumptions that should always hold. This helps catch logic errors
early during development and improves code reliability

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor(storage): Improve code quality across classes
commitResults.messageBody:
- Extracted task parsing logic into a new parseTaskLine method
  to improve readability and maintainability.
- Updated Javadoc comments for better clarity and consistency.
- Added input validation in parseTaskLine to prevent
  malformed task entries from causing runtime errors.

This refactoring makes loadTasks more modular and easier to
extend in the future while maintaining robust error handling.
refactor: add assertions to document critical assumptions

* branch-A-CodeQuality:
  refactor(storage): Improve code quality across classes
refactor(storage): Improve code quality across classes

commitResults.messageTitle: fix(parser): Correct date-time parsing for Event and Deadline
commitResults.messageBody:
- Updated Parser logic to properly parse date-time inputs into
  the correct LocalDateTime format.
- Ensured consistent date-time formatting when creating new Event
  and Deadline tasks.

This fixes inconsistencies in date-time parsing, improving
task creation accuracy and user experience.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add update command to edit existing tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented UPDATE command in Sebastian to allow users to modify
  the description of existing tasks.
- Prompted users for a second input to enter the new task description.
- Added update method to Task to support updates.
- Ensured tasks are updated and saved correctly in Storage.

This enhances task management by allowing users to modify tasks
without deleting and recreating them.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(parser): add date-time validation in checkDateValidity
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented checkDateValidity method in Parser class.
- Ensures that dates are not in the past.
- Ensures that the start date is not after the end date.

commitResults.messageTitle: test: add TaskTest for update method and expand ParserTest for checkDateValidity
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added TaskTest class to test the update method in Task class.
- Covered cases for updating description, valid deadlines, past deadlines, and invalid fields.
- Added more test cases in ParserTest to validate checkDateValidity method.
- Ensured robust exception handling and date validation.
